text: 2|112|karpit minmen dauchnaoh te ( anak del ban chaul thansuokr  noh)  ku anak del ban brakl khluonobran robsa ke champoh a l laoh  daoy pheap smaohtrang  .  dau che  neah  samreab anak noh nung ttuol banophl  bony pi mcheasa robsa ke  haey puokke kmean karphyokhlach  ning pruoybaromph  avei laey .
